description: This file declares exported API functions for the SLAP Env Controller component, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions. It serves as an interface header defining prototypes for external use within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane implementation.

methods.name: SlapCreateEnvController
methods.description: Creates an environment controller handle with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapEcoCreate
methods.description: Creates an environment controller instance with specified contexts.

methods.name: SlapEcoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified environment controller object.

methods.name: SlapEcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects into the environment controller.
